type.description: Provide the type of Code Snippet

showMoreText.description:
Specify a string that is displayed when the Code Snippet text is more
than 15 lines

showLessText.description:
Specify a string that is displayed when the Code Snippet has been
interacted with to show more lines

className.description: Specify an optional className to be applied to the container node

children.description: Provide the content of your CodeSnippet as a string

feedback.description: Specify the string displayed when the snippet is copied

copyButtonDescription.description: Specify the description for the Copy Button

onClick.description:
An optional handler to listen to the `onClick` even fired by the Copy
Button

copyLabel.description:
Specify a label to be read by screen readers on the containing <textbox>
node

ariaLabel.description:
Specify a label to be read by screen readers on the containing <textbox>
node

light.description:
Specify whether you are using the light variant of the Code Snippet,
typically used for inline snippet to display an alternate color

tabIndex.description: Optional prop to specify the tabIndex of the Button

type.description: Optional prop to specify the type of the Button

disabled.description: Specify whether the Button should be disabled, or not

type.name: enum
type.description: Specify the kind of Button you want to create

kind.description: Specify the kind of Button you want to create

children.description: Specify the content of your Button

as.description:
Specify how the button itself should be rendered.
Make sure to apply all props to the root node and render children appropriately

className.description: Specify an optional className to be added to your Button

size.description:
Specify the size of the button, from a list of available sizes.
For `default` buttons, this prop can remain unspecified.

type.name: custom
type.raw: deprecate(PropTypes.bool, "\nThe prop `small` for Button has been deprecated in favor of `size`. Please use `size=\"small\"` instead.")

small.description:
Deprecated in v10 in favor of `size`.
Specify whether the Button should be a small variant

href.description: Optionally specify an href for your Button to become an <a> element

role.description: Optional prop to specify the role of the Button

renderIcon.description:
Optional prop to allow overriding the icon rendering.
Can be a React component class

type.name: custom

iconDescription.description:
If specifying the `renderIcon` prop, provide a description for that icon that can
be read by screen readers

hasIconOnly.description: Specify if the button is an icon-only button

tooltipPosition.description:
Specify the direction of the tooltip for icon-only buttons.
Can be either top, right, bottom, or left.

tooltipAlignment.description:
Specify the alignment of the tooltip to the icon-only button.
Can be one of: start, center, or end.
